name: Space Surf: Shark Attack
summary:
You are Tyrone Stallion, a world famous surfer riding some of the gnarliest waves ever surfed! But there’s trouble in the water. A 10 foot great white shark named Brutus is after you! Surf waves, whales, dolphins, birds, airplanes and UFO’s to stay ahead of Brutus the shark!

Surf past as many islands as you can and discover all the incredible things you can interact with in this exciting, action packed surfing endless runner!
